# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(hello_world LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(hello_world "")
set_target_properties(hello_world PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "hello_world")
set_target_properties(hello_world PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/release")
target_include_directories(hello_world SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /Users/alexischangridel/.conan2/p/b/glfw6f063ac352114/p/include
)
target_compile_definitions(hello_world PRIVATE
    GL_SILENCE_DEPRECATION=1
)
target_compile_options(hello_world PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:arm64-apple-macos14.5>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:arm64-apple-macos14.5>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.5.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.5.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(hello_world PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(hello_world PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(hello_world PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET hello_world PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(hello_world PRIVATE
    glfw3
    "-framework AppKit"
    "-framework Cocoa"
    "-framework CoreFoundation"
    "-framework CoreGraphics"
    "-framework CoreServices"
    "-framework Foundation"
    "-framework IOKit"
    "-framework OpenGL"
)
target_link_directories(hello_world PRIVATE
    /Users/alexischangridel/.conan2/p/b/glfw6f063ac352114/p/lib
)
target_link_options(hello_world PRIVATE
    -target
    arm64-apple-macos14.5
    -isysroot
    /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.5.sdk
    -lz
)
target_sources(hello_world PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
